channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:51 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 23:51 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
